data_description.badge_name: Enter a unique name for the badge. This name will be displayed in the system.
data_description.badge_description: Provide a description of the badge's purpose or criteria (optional).
data_description.badge_labels: Add labels to categorize or tag the badge (optional).
data_description.icon: Specify an icon for the badge using Material Design Icons (e.g., mdi:star).
data_description.target_type: Select the type of target for this badge (e.g., points or chore count).
data_description.threshold_value: Set the total lifetime points required to earn this badge.
data_description.maintenance_rules: Specify the minimum points required during the maintenance cycle to retain the badge and its active multiplier (optional).
data_description.occasion_type: Choose the type of occasion for this badge (e.g., holiday, birthday).
data_description.associated_achievement: Link this badge to an achievement for tracking.
data_description.associated_challenge: Link this badge to a challenge for tracking.
data_description.selected_chores: Select the chores that contribute points toward this badge. Leave blank if you want to track all assigned chores (optional).
data_description.assigned_to: Assign this badge to specific kids for tracking.
data_description.award_items: Select one or more from points, rewards, bonuses, or a points multiplier. All selected items will be granted or applied when the badge is earned. (optional)
data_description.award_points: If points are a selected award, specify the number of points to apply when this badge is earned. (optional).
data_description.points_multiplier: If multiplier is a selected award, set a multiplier for points earned while this badge is active (e.g., 1.5x).
data_description.recurring_frequency: Enable the maintenance cycle, requiring the specified minimum points to be earned before the end of the period. (e.g., weekly, monthly).
data_description.custom_interval: Specify the NUMBER of days, week, months, etc. for Custom Frequency (e.g., 3 if you set 3 weeks). Only applies to Custom Frequency.
data_description.custom_interval_unit: Select the unit for the custom interval (e.g., days, weeks). Only applies to Custom Frequency.
data_description.end_date: Select the date for the end of the maintenance cycle. (optional).
data_description.grace_period_days: Specify the number of extra days after the end of the cycle kids to meet required points before demotion. (optional).

data_description.chore_name: Unique name displayed throughout the system.
data_description.chore_description: Optional instructions or details about how to complete this chore.
data_description.chore_labels: Tags to organize chores (e.g., 'kitchen', 'outdoor'). Leave blank if not needed.
data_description.assigned_kids: Kids who can see and claim this chore.
data_description.completion_criteria: How shared chores work: Independent (each kid completes separately), Shared All (all must approve), or Shared First (first approval completes chore).
data_description.approval_reset_type: Controls when this chore resets and how many completions are allowed during that period.
data_description.approval_reset_pending_claim_action: When this chore resets (based on Completion Reset Timing above), what happens to claims still waiting for approval?
data_description.overdue_handling_type: What happens when due date passes: Manual review (no action), Auto-reject (deny claims), or Auto-approve (grant points anyway).
data_description.auto_approve: When enabled, claims are instantly approved without parent review.
data_description.recurring_frequency: How often the chore recurs: Daily, Weekly, Monthly, Yearly, Custom, or None.
data_description.custom_interval: Number of time units between repetitions (e.g., 3 for 'every 3 weeks'). Only used with Custom frequency.
data_description.custom_interval_unit: Time unit for custom interval (days, weeks, months). Only used with Custom frequency.
data_description.applicable_days: Restrict chore to specific weekdays. Leave blank for all days.
data_description.due_date: Optional deadline. Can be combined with recurring schedules.
data_description.show_on_calendar: Display this chore on the calendar view.
data_description.chore_notifications: When to send notifications: On claim, on approval, on rejection, or any combination.
